title: Trade Bait for HOFers with mid-tier and rare backs (or can buy)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Trade Bait for HOFers with mid-tier and rare backs (or can buy)
posts.post_content:
Hi guys, I am looking for HOFers with tougher backs.  Pretty much all backs other than Piedmont, Sweet Cap and Polar Bear, and the rarer the better.  I'm not too picky about condition, but I might pass on cards in very poor condition.

Here is some trade bait I have, and I also have cash.
